answer: Resultados top: Mini Chök Vegano, Helado De Chocolate Negro Sin Azúcar (350 Ml.), Eureka Chocolate Con Leche Sin Azúcar, Helado de chocolate bajo en azúcar (250 ml.), Lote 6

retrieval.vector_sql: SELECT id AS id, product_name AS name, product_description AS text, s3_url AS image_url, 1 - (text_emb_je3 <=> %s::vector) AS score FROM glovo_ai.products ORDER BY text_emb_je3 <=> %s::vector ASC LIMIT %s
retrieval.lexical_sql:
SELECT id AS id, product_name AS name,
               product_description AS text, s3_url AS image_url,
               ts_rank_cd(
                 to_tsvector('spanish', coalesce(product_name, '') || ' ' || coalesce(product_description, '')),
                 plainto_tsquery('spanish', %s)
               ) AS lex_score
        FROM glovo_ai.products
        WHERE to_tsvector('spanish', coalesce(product_name, '') || ' ' || coalesce(product_description, ''))
              @@ plainto_tsquery('spanish', %s)
        ORDER BY lex_score DESC
        LIMIT %s
